Pest Control in the Kitchen

Spring pests, like ants, love kitchen spaces because of the availability of potential water and food sources. Crumbs, spill residue, and food left out are some of their favorite snacks. Here are a few things to tackle at the beginning of each season to help prevent pests in the kitchen: -Clean out all of your cabinets and pantry. Discard stale or outdated foods and spices. -Thoroughly clean the inside of your cabinets and replace old shelf paper. -Vacuum behind your appliances‚Äîthere‚Äôs probably a good bit of dust back there! -Clear off your counters and give them a good scrub, looking out for any sticky spots or residue in hard-to-reach areas.

Common Terms & Phrases

Consider educating your followers about these, as needed

June bugs

The term "June bug" can refer to a number of different species of beetles. The name is derived from the fact that they typically emerge towards the beginning of summer. They are harmless to people and animals but because they are attracted to light, they can be a big nuisance at night. Many pest control companies offer services related to June bug control.
